analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x0eee422255002836a57f0b582f70dd87ccf2ee41.sol:
	Contract Bitcratic has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x0eee422255002836a57f0b582f70dd87ccf2ee41.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x0eee422255002836a57f0b582f70dd87ccf2ee41.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Bitcratic.burn (/unique_chucks/25/0x0eee422255002836a57f0b582f70dd87ccf2ee41.sol#208) is not in mixedCase
